com.hazelcast.jca
Interface HazelcastConnection

All Superinterfaces:
javax.resource.cci.Connection, HazelcastInstance
All Known Implementing Classes:
HazelcastConnectionImpl
public interface HazelcastConnection
extends javax.resource.cci.Connection, HazelcastInstance

Hazelcast specific connection which allows access to this hazelcast instance to acquire the maps, lists etc.
